Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Penn State introduced Bill O’Brien, the New England Patriots’ offensive coordinator, as its new football coach Saturday. He will face several challenges in succeeding Joe Paterno.
snippet: Penn State introduced Bill O’Brien, the New England Patriots’ offensive coordinator, as its new football coach Saturday. He will face several challenges in succeeding Joe Paterno.
